column1: Nice thing to do! But probably quite risky for coronavirus transfer. Too much contact between people... I hope there will be no increase in COVID cases in 1 week!

FIRST day since months going out for a #Restaurant in #Luxembourg because of #CoronaVirus #COVID19 restrictions. I recommend <===> #Restaurant WEIDENDALL in #KOPSTAL <===> #EatingCulture #TOPCuisine #photos. Delicious, délicieux, lecker, yummy yummy
